reviewText: Little different take from the original version but a good movie that provides the dash and adventure you would expect from Zorro and maintains the Zorro image.

reviewText: If you want action and entertainment, this is it. I enjoyed it all the way. I like how Antonio Banderas' transformation from an unruly kid to a well mannered gentleman as he matured.

reviewText: Two great features in this movie;  Antonio Banderas and Catherine Zeta Jones!  Banderas does a good job of play the hero and Jones could just stand still the whole movie and it would be alright with me.  Enjoy the action in this movie thought the Zorro scenario has been done to death!
summary: Antonio Banderas my kind of Zorro

reviewText: if u don't think too much and relax then you will like this movie. its fun old style drama and nice story and great fight scenes with humor. the movie doesn't take itself too seriously and everyone plays his/her role just right.  sometimes a little too modern, a gossamer sheen of self irony  to let you know the actor's have played more challenging  roles
summary: high excitement and darn good story
